_description: South Florida county council district extraction - Palm Beach and Broward Counties

notes: Fort Lauderdale FL - 4 commission districts. Layer 56 'Fort Lauderdale Elected Representatives - Election Administration'. City-operated GIS (gis.fortlauderdale.gov).

Hollywood FL - 6 commission districts (Mayor at-large + Districts 1-6). Interactive web app; underlying service at maps.hollywoodfl.org. Commission_Districts_Outline service currently not started - may need direct layer access.

Pembroke Pines FL - 4 commission districts (Mayor at-large + Districts 1-4). New map adopted March 16, 2022 (Ordinance 1986). PDF map available; GIS service not found but city has redistricting page at ppines.com/1482/Redistricting.
Pompano Beach FL - Commission districts. Interactive map via data.pompanobeachfl.gov showcase. City open data portal with ArcGIS REST API support (CSV, GeoJSON, KML formats available).

Davie FL (Town) - 4 council districts (Mayor at-large + Districts 1-4). New district map adopted Dec 1, 2021 (Plan 01-A). ArcGIS Public Gallery at daviefl.maps.arcgis.com. Find Your District tool at davie-fl.gov/167.
Boynton Beach FL - 4 commission districts (Mayor at-large + Districts 1-4). Commission-Manager form. Interactive ArcGIS app. Library archives show district maps from 2009+.

source: City of West Palm Beach Elections; wpb.org/government/city-clerk/2024-elections-information
notes: 5 commissioners elected at-large citywide on nonpartisan basis, but commissioners must reside in their respective district. 2-year terms. Elections held second Tuesday of March. Has district boundaries for residency purposes but NOT geographic district elections. City Open Data Portal: gisportal-wpbgis.opendata.arcgis.com
5-member council elected at-large to designated seats (Mayor, Seats A-D) on nonpartisan basis. 3-year terms with 2-term limit. Council-Manager government since 1957.
All 5 commission seats elected at-large citywide. 3-year terms. Seats are numbered but all voters vote in all races. Non-partisan.
5 at-large elected officials (Groups 1-5). Council-Manager form per city Charter. 3-year overlapping terms. Mayor and Vice Mayor appointed by council from among members. GIS at gis.pbgfl.com.

5 members (Mayor + 4 council). Two must reside in First District, two in Second District, Mayor in either. BUT all are elected at-large by entire town. 3-year terms. Interactive district map at jupiter.fl.us/Elections.
Village of Wellington - 5-member council (Mayor seat 1 + Seats 2-4) all elected at-large. 4-year staggered terms. Council-Manager form. Non-partisan elections in March. GIS at wellingtonfl.gov/288.
